DOC.brief_title: Trial Treatment With Inhaled Furosemide Preterm Term Neonates With Transient Tachypnoea
DOC.detailed_description: In study prospectively analyze benefit inhale furosemide preterm term neonate transient Tachypnoea . Patients receive nebulised Furosemide iv solution 1 mg/kg nebulised 0,9 % saline ( 4x/d ) blind condition random order long need CPAP-treatment max . 3 day . 20 Patient treating . The benefit measure reduction dyspnea , respiratory rate , oxygen demand time CPAP .
DOC.criteria: Neonates 35+039+0 GA first day life clinical diagnosis Transient Tachypnoea The need CPAP > 6 h obtain oxygen saturation > 92 % Written inform consent parent/guardian Systemic infection Intubation mechanical ventilation Inclusion trail Malformation several disease disturb respiratory Subjects participate clinical trial
